sprints.title: Sprint 1: Validate Platform Efficiency and Integration
sprints.goal: This sprint aims to validate whether doctors find the platform's curated content more efficient than traditional methods and if the platform can effectively integrate with existing medical systems.

items.task: Conduct a Survey on Content Efficiency
items.objective: Doctors will find the platform's curated content more efficient than traditional methods.
items.success_metric: Achieve >70% positive feedback on content efficiency from surveyed doctors.
items.notes: Survey on content efficiency completed with 75% positive feedback, exceeding the >70% success metric. Business Model Canvas (Value Proposition) and Value Proposition Canvas (Customer Gains) updated to reflect validated efficiency. Analysis confirmed, and learnings applied.

items.objective: The platform can effectively integrate with existing medical systems.
items.success_metric: Successful integration with at least 3 major medical systems without performance issues.

items.objective: Doctors will find the platform's curated content more efficient than traditional methods.
items.success_metric: 80% of focus group participants prefer the platform's content delivery over traditional methods.

items.task: Conduct A/B Testing on Integration Features
items.objective: The platform can effectively integrate with existing medical systems.
items.success_metric: Identify the most effective integration feature with a >10% increase in user satisfaction.

items.objective: Doctors will find the platform's curated content more efficient than traditional methods.
items.success_metric: Gather qualitative insights from at least 20 doctors on platform efficiency.

sprints.title: Sprint 2: Validate Subscription and Infrastructure
sprints.goal: Validating whether doctors will subscribe to the platform for access to up-to-date medical research and if the platform's digital infrastructure can support a large user base without performance issues.

items.objective: Doctors will subscribe to the platform for access to up-to-date medical research.
items.success_metric: 50% of surveyed doctors express willingness to subscribe at proposed pricing.

items.objective: The platform's digital infrastructure can support a large user base without performance issues.
items.success_metric: Platform maintains performance with 10,000 concurrent users during load testing.

items.objective: Doctors will subscribe to the platform for access to up-to-date medical research.
items.success_metric: Achieve > 10% conversion rate from early adopters at tested pricing tiers.

items.objective: The platform's digital infrastructure can support a large user base without performance issues.
items.success_metric: No critical failures during stress testing with peak user loads.

items.objective: Doctors will subscribe to the platform for access to up-to-date medical research.
items.success_metric: Collect qualitative feedback from 15 doctors on subscription value perception.
